name: Seasoned Herder
description:
Seasoned Herder

Made in a 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47  for which the theme was Stuck in a loop. Made in Unity 2020.1.7f1.

How to play

Move through the seasons to herd animals for a high score.
Obstacles will alter your speed.

Controls

Keyboard - WASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys
Gamepad - Left-stick / D-pad

Credits

Programming by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
Music by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)

Source code available on GitHub
